item.title: Descriptive Analysis of Amazon Top 50 Bestselling Books 2009 - 2019
item.description: Recently I finished an Alura course named Python for Data Science and I want to put what I learned into practice, to do so I’ll make a descriptive analysis on this dataset Amazon Top 50 Bestselling Books 2009 - 2019. It contains 550 books and the data has been categorized as fiction and non-fiction by Goodreads. All of the code can be found here. I started checking the first five observations from the dataset.

item.title: Have COVID Impacted California Traffic Collisions?
